title: Myrtle Beach Resort Group Launches "Friendliest Place on the Beach" Initiative
text:
Vacation Myrtle Beach
MYRTLE BEACH, S.C. , Sept. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Myrtle Beach, South Carolina is the top beach destination on the east coast offering more than 200 resorts and hotels for the more than 14 million visitors that come to the area each year. The Vacation Myrtle Beach resort group, comprised of 14 oceanfront resorts, has found a new way to stand out among the crowded landscape at the beach by building a stronger relationship with their guests.
Vacation Myrtle Beach resorts , by Legacy Business Solutions, are launching the "Friendliest Place on the Beach" initiative that includes ongoing training with all employees, guest surveys and contests. Implementing this new program for the already successful resort group with 50 years of experience in the hotel industry in Myrtle Beach was a natural step for the group, which has a long history of great guest service and care.
"We know that by providing friendly guest service to our guests that we can make a huge difference in their stay with us," said Matt Klugman , Vacation Myrtle Beach marketing director. "Everyone will have the tools they need to treat our guests like family."
Training and development for the program at these family-friendly resorts will include daily departmental meetings featuring various categories of focus including how to impress even the smallest guests â€“ children.
"Our staff has already developed many great friendships with families who come back annually, allowing for a great foundation to build our program upon," said Klugman.
Beyond the ongoing training, a social media contest will be introduced, encouraging guests to share their positive experiences with #HappyGuest included in their Facebook, Twitter or Instagram post.
"We're excited to kick off this initiative that will become ingrained in the culture of our company from the ground up," said Klugman.
Learn more about the "Friendliest Place on the Beach" initiative here .
About VacationMyrtleBeach.com Resorts
VacationMyrtleBeach.com is the official vacation site of Myrtle Beach, SC , offering the guaranteed lowest rate on nearly 4,000 accommodations units ranging from studios to five bedroom condominiums. VacationMyrtleBeach.com resorts also offer a range of amenities including pools, water parks, lazy rivers, restaurants, bowling center, tennis center, racquetball courts, fitness rooms, miniature golf course and swim up pool bar. For more information, visit VacationMyrtleBeach.com or call 888-414-1397.
